sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM sappe.questao WHERE id IN ((SELECT id FROM sappe.questao WHERE ano=#ano#) EXCEPT (SELECT questao_id FROM sappe.questao_prova as qp WHERE EXISTS(SELECT id FROM sappe.prova as p WHERE qp.prova_id=id AND p.usuario_id=#id#))) ORDER BY random() LIMIT #qtdq#;

SELECT * FROM sappe.questao WHERE id IN ((SELECT id FROM sappe.questao WHERE area_id=#tpid# AND exame_id=#ide#) EXCEPT (SELECT questao_id FROM sappe.questao_prova as qp WHERE EXISTS(SELECT id FROM sappe.prova as p WHERE qp.prova_id=id AND p.usuario_id=#id#))) ORDER BY random() LIMIT #qtdq#;
SELECT * FROM sappe.questao WHERE id IN ((SELECT id FROM sappe.questao WHERE exame_id=#ide#) EXCEPT (SELECT questao_id FROM sappe.questao_simulado)) ORDER BY random() LIMIT #qtdq#;
